source.title: Study Guide ABC Foundation
source.description: Preparation for the ABC Part 1 Examination
source.author: Prepared by Donna Smith of Cassini Consulting

tests.stem: How many certification levels are there in the ABC Essestials certification?
Which one of the following is the entry level certification for an individual?

keys.comment: B There are two levels; Level 1 leads to ABC Foundation and Level 2 leads to ABC Certified.
ABC Foundation is the entry-level qualification. Options C and D do not exist as options within the program.
